title: Mild Thai Green Curry

ingredients.content: 6 ½ oz Thai green curry paste
16 oz chicken thighs, boneless and skinless, cut into 1 in. cubes
1 - 2 fresh kaffir lime leaves, to taste
6 ½ oz cauliflower, cut into bite-size florets
2 ½ oz red bell pepper, cut into ⅛ in. slices
6 oz kabocha squash, peeled, diced into ¾ in. pieces
3 ½ oz green peas (fresh or frozen)
fresh green chili, sliced, to garnish

preparations.content: Place oil, Thai green curry paste and coconut milk into mixing bowl and cook <b>15 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken, fish sauce, palm sugar, kaffir lime leaf, cauliflower, red pepper, squash, green peas and cook <b>15 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Transfer to a serving dish, remove lime leaves and sprinkle with cilantro leaves. Serve with steamed rice.

hintsAndTricks: Make steamed rice before making curry and keep warm.
Add additional fresh chili for a hotter curry.
